name: Mobiversal
tag_list: mobile-app-agency, mobile-app-development-studio, mobile-app-developer, , iphone, ipad, android
overview:
Mobiversal is a mobile app agency providing exquisite development and design services to companies small and big. Mobiversal has expertise on iOS, Android, Blackberry, Windows and has built from productivity tools, games to navigation apps.

In a year and a half since its inception, Mobiversal served over 30 customers from US, UK, Israel, Austria, Belgium and Romania. The apps built by Mobiversal have been downloaded more than 1.000.000 times and received over 1000 Five-Star ratings.

Some of Mobiversal’s clients:

PhantomALERT - PhantomALERT provides the world’s largest driver generated and verified database of speed traps, with over 400,000 enforcement and safety locations that will transform your smartphone into a virtual radar detector. PhantomALERT has been featured on BBC, CNN, CBS, NBC and FOX News.

Find a Way, José! is a new and refreshing take on the sliding-block puzzler genre. The game is available on iOS devices and was No.1 in the Games/Board category in several countries like Austria, Brazil, Germany, Italy, Spain, Uruguay and on top positions on a lot of other countries. The game had over 200,000 downloads in the first 6 months after launch and also won the third place in Buzz App Awards 2012, a contest with judges from Mashable and Go2web20.

Paymo - Paymo helps businesses and freelancers solve their project management, time tracking and invoicing problems by providing them with really easy to use desktop, web and mobile apps. With users in 105 countries, Paymo helped track 10.6 million hours, users generating over $100 million in revenue.

connect - It’s the most important technology magazine in Romania and one of the biggest in Europe. Connect Romania has over 100,000 readers for each edition and it covers mobile, wireless technologies, laptops, navigation systems, accessories, games and the latest Internet news.
